markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Specific Magic Weapon](/Rules.aspx?ID=767)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 600 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
These weapons have abilities far different from what can be gained by simply etching runes. A specific magic weapon lists its [fundamental runes](/Equipment.aspx?Category=23&Subcategory=25), which you can upgrade, add, or transfer as normal. You can't etch or transfer any [property runes](/Equipment.aspx?Category=23&Subcategory=27) onto a specific weapon that it doesn't already have, and you can't remove its property runes.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Specific Magic Weapon
